levels.description:
When HP is above <@ba.vup>{peak_performance.hp_ratio:0%}</>, gains <$ba.strong>Vigor</> effect of <@ba.vup>+{peak_performance.atk:0%}</> ATK
The first time a Leader enemy appears on the field, Laios cannot attack for <@ba.vdown>15</> seconds
